refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a PART shape that encompasses two specified SPH shapes based on their parameters.

refsection.para: Creates a PART shape that encompasses two specified SPH shapes based on their parameters.
The example shows the use of the sph-part command to create a PART shape that surrounds two specified spheres.

info.title: Create a PART shape that surrounds two specified spheres.

example.para: Creates a PART shape named part.s that surrounds the spheres sph1.s and sph2.s.
